title: Wiwo
author: Wiwo
content: As the date for the 2023/general election draw closer, we have quite a good number of development in Nigera and one of which is the adoption of electronic voting and inline with the new electoral law that will allow inec to conduct a free and fair election, Â and to achieve that is the adoption of electronics voting which is part of the electoral law passed recently, Â and in practice inec have adopt a numbers of ways to get the electorates prepared ahead of the poll every registered voters in Nigeria can now verify the status of their voters card on the inec website. Below is link to verify your voters statushttps://voters.inecnigeria.org

When there is epileptic power supply and internet brigandage every where not to talk of our local communities that are not even digitally inclined how do they do about that.Â  Internet Service is poorly available in the villages and most of the communities are near inaccessible some are island and difficult to access as well.
